entry.title: SPML Infra Secures Rs. 207.38 Crore Water Infrastructure Project in Rajasthan
entry.content:
Top News
SPML Infra Secures Rs. 207.38 Crore Water Infrastructure Project in Rajasthan 14 minutes ago
SPML Infra Limited, in a joint venture with Shree Hari Infraprojects Private Limited, has won a Rs. 207.38 crore contract from the Public Health Engineering Department of Jhalawar, Rajasthan. The project, part of the Jal Jeevan Mission, involves constructing and operating water supply infrastructure in the Kota-Bundi region. It includes building intake wells, water treatment plants, reservoirs, and pipelines, benefiting over 1.03 million people. The contract includes 10 years of operations and maintenance.

entry.title: Veedol Corporation's UK Subsidiaries Face Auditor Resignation
entry.content:
Veedol Corporation's UK Subsidiaries Face Auditor Resignation 1 hour ago
M/s. SHORTS, Chartered Accountants, have resigned as statutory auditors for three UK-based subsidiaries of Veedol Corporation Limited, effective December 4, 2025. The affected entities include Veedol UK Limited (a material subsidiary), Veedol International Limited, and Granville Oil & Chemicals Limited. The auditors stated no concerns or circumstances requiring attention from company members or creditors. Veedol Corporation will need to appoint new auditors for these subsidiaries.

entry.title: Vidarbha Tradelinks Boosts Stake in Bajaj Steel Industries Through NCLT-Approved Scheme
entry.content:
Vidarbha Tradelinks Boosts Stake in Bajaj Steel Industries Through NCLT-Approved Scheme 11 minutes ago
Vidarbha Tradelinks Private Limited, a promoter group entity, has increased its shareholding in Bajaj Steel Industries Limited through an NCLT-sanctioned scheme of arrangement. The transaction involved acquiring 26,400 equity shares from Rohit Polytex Limited, increasing Vidarbha Tradelinks' stake from 8.04% to 8.17%. The acquisition was completed on December 4, 2025, as part of a scheme involving Bajaj Exports Private Limited, Rohit Polytex Limited, and Vidarbha Tradelinks Private Limited.

entry.title: ICICI Prudential AMC Announces IPO Price Band, Signaling Strong Market Position
entry.content:
ICICI Prudential AMC Announces IPO Price Band, Signaling Strong Market Position 2 hours ago
ICICI Prudential Asset Management Company has set the price band for its initial public offering at ₹2,061 to ₹2,165 per equity share, with a minimum bid lot of 6 shares. The company's financial data shows growth, with total assets increasing by 5.22% to ₹308,847.00 crore and investments growing by 4.92% to ₹304,054.00 crore over the past year. The IPO is expected to attract significant investor interest due to the company's strong market position in India's asset management industry.
